Summary: IT IS ON A SHORT VIDEO NOW
divs: Sighting DetailsROUND UFO SPOTED IN BUENA PARK CALIFORNIA, UFO SEEMS TO BE BETWEEN WHITE AND ORANGE COLOR, UFO NOT MOVING, THEN IT MOVES RIGHT ON TOP OF US, ANS SPINNING AROUND, THEN UFO MOVES SLOWLY AND GOES AWAY, THIS IS THE SAME UFO THAT I HAVE SEEN MANY TIMES BEFORE, I TOOK MY DAUGHTER 1 TIME TO SEE IT WITH ME AND THE UFO SHOWED UP AGAIN, NOW MY DAUGHTER BELIEVES ME, THIS UFO IS IN A VERY SHORT VIDEO,YOU CAN ONLY SEE THE VIDEO ON A VCR TAPE PLAYER.
